title: Facebook hits out at Russia blocking its platforms
description: The Russian communications regulator said on Friday that Facebook has been blocked in the country.

title: Microsoft stops selling products in Russia
description: The tech giant will no longer sell products and services there following the invasion of Ukraine.

title: Ukraine says it is fighting first 'hybrid war'
description: Alongside the conventional war in Ukraine, a cyber-conflict is also being fought, says the government.

title: Fitbit recalls Ionic watch following skin burns
description: The US regulator received more than 70 reports of burn injuries from the Fitbit Ionic's battery.

title: Ukraine conflict: Government to sell NFTs to fund war against Russia
description: The announcement comes just days after Ukraine raised more than £200m in a sale of war bonds.
